comments:
I tryied creating the Static Log Parser with TPTP4.0.0(Stable Build TPTP-4.0-
200504151511) with refering to the Help "Creating a log parser".

When I choose my log parser and a log file, then press OK button, an error 
below has occured.
Could you give me any solution?

-----------------------------------------
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.AdapterException: IWAT0426E The static 
parser class MyParser could not be loaded.  Ensure it is accessible via the 
classpath or an extension point.
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.Controller.prepareAdapter
(Controller.java:326)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.Adapter.start(Adapter.java:111)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.parse
(ParserWrapper.java:112)
	at 
org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.LocalLogParserLoader.startPar
sing(LocalLogParserLoader.java:89)
	at 
org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImpor
tJob.runOnLocalHost(ImportLogWizard.java:951)
	at 
org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImpor
tJob.run(ImportLogWizard.java:939)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)

The documentation in the driver mentioned is not correct.  It is currently 
being updated and will be available in the final iteration 3 driver.  Please 
try following the new documentation when it becomes available and re-open the 
defect if you still have problems.

If you want to resolve this now, please ensure you have created a 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.staticParser extension in the plugin.xml 
file for your static parser plugin.

traces.message: IWAT0426E The static  parser class MyParser could not be loaded.  Ensure it is accessible via the  classpath or an extension point.
